Action.author: jyellick
Action.body: This seems like something is connecting on the port, then disconnecting before completing the handshake. Are the log messages correlated with anything being performed on the network?

Action.author: samwood
Action.body: We see this as well although it doesn't disrupt any operations in the network. We suspect it's a misconfigured tcp health check that terminates the connection immediately, but we haven't pinpointed the source.Â

Action.author: samwood
Action.body: Indeed, in our case we narrowed down these EOFs to a AWS NLB that defaults to TCP health checks against the peer serving TLS.
